response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs and aspirations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be an asset to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This offer reflects not only its market value but also acknowledges its significance in achieving your goals. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this opportunity to fruition together.", "product_price": 12000}
